name: Space Karutsa 1995
description: In 1995 thousands of Bulgarians waited for aliens to land at the airport in Ruse, Bulgaria, because of a fortune-teller's prediction. This game shows what it would have been like if the aliens actually arrived and crashed in a village near Ruse, where they would've had to mount UFO technology on a karutsa (cart) and space travel. (Best played in Full Screen mode)
